enable_ipv6.docs:
**boolean**: Enables IPv6 support. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Network component](https://esphome.io/components/network.html#configuration-variables)*

min_ipv6_addr_count.docs:
**integer**: ESPHome considers the network to be connected when it has one IPv4 address and this number of IPv6 addresses. Defaults to `0` so as to not hang on boot with networks where IPv6 is not enabled. `2` is typically a reasonable value for configurations requiring IPv6.

*See also: [Network component](https://esphome.io/components/network.html#configuration-variables)*
